text: Motion
It was so much fun!

It ended in the blink of an eye
I wanted to sing more!
Haha, I'm glad you felt good about it.

Asahi, you looked so confident and cool
I was surprised.
Ahaha.
It's great that so many people showed up!
That's... thanks to Asahi's calling, right?
Is that so?

Thank you for your hard work. But when you're
performing on the streets, make sure to consult with me.
I understand.
By consultation, I don't just mean reporting...
Oh, go ahead.

Excuse me, I know you're tired... But if it's okay,
could you greet the fans?
...Huh? Fans?

Even after the live, there are still many fans waiting for Serizawa-san
If you could just say a few words, even just for a moment...!

Oh, that's amazing
Let's do it!

â”€Ah. You're going too, right?
Producer-san.

Ah, yeah... of course.
Asahi, are you not tired?
Ahaha, I'm totally fine.

Come on!
Producer-san, let's go quickly~!
